3. Commission Adjustment
Considering product competitiveness and to soothe the impact of premium increment, the commission
rate will be reduced from 37.5% to 30%. Nonetheless, the influence on commission amount is managed
to minimal level as far as possible - premium increment should largely offset the impact from the
commission rate reduction.
Illustrative example: PRUChoice Personal Accident Insurance (Class 1; - Original Sum Insured Amount of
ADPD: HK$500,000 and AME: HK$15,000)
Original Commission Income

to HK$780,000)

HK$471.5

HK$35.1
Review the client discount at renewal
We understand some financial consultants may have allowed client discount to customers in the past. We
will send emails to remind financial consultants to review client discount in response to the commission
adjustment before we print renewal documents to those customers whose policies are due to renew on or
after 2 Sep 2023. Financial consultants shall reply to indicate any change of discount intended for the
renewal policies. (A default discount rate, which is the last year's discount or 30%, whichever is the lower,
will be applied if we do not receive any response within the specified time frame), and customers will
receive renewal documents with the updated discount rate.

3. Commission Adjustment
Considering product competitiveness and to soothe the impact of premium increment, the commission
rate will be reduced from 37.5% to 30%. Nonetheless, the influence on commission amount is managed
to minimal level as far as possible - premium increment should largely offset the impact from the
commission rate reduction.
Illustrative example: PRUChoice Personal Accident Insurance (Class 1; - Original Sum Insured Amount of
ADPD: HK$500,000 and AME: HK$15,000)

to HK$780,000)

Review the client discount at renewal
We understand some financial consultants may have allowed client discount to customers in the past. We
will send emails to remind financial consultants to review client discount in response to the commission
adjustment before we print renewal documents to those customers whose policies are due to renew on or
after 2 Sep 2023. Financial consultants shall reply to indicate any change of discount intended for the
renewal policies. (A default discount rate, which is the last year's discount or 30%, whichever is the lower,
will be applied if we do not receive any response within the specified time frame), and customers will
receive renewal documents with the updated discount rate.

Dealing With Clients' Usual Questions
處理客戶常見問題
Question: Can I get back my assets from an
IRREVOCABLE discretionary trust?
問題:我是否可以從不可撤銷的全權代管信
託取回我的資產?
19
交通銀行信託有限公司
BANK OF COMMUNICATIONS TRUSTEE LIMITEDDealing With Clients' Usual Questions
處理客戶常見問題
Answer:
Depends on how the Settlor transfers his asset into the Trust
(by gift OR by way of sale?)
視乎成立人如何轉移資產至信託(送贈或賣買?)
· If by way of sale, Settlor can request Trustee for debt
repayment.
如以買賣方式,成立人可要求受託人還款。
· Trustee can also appoint Settlor as the trust beneficiary and
distribute trust asset to him.
受託人也可委任成立人爲受益人及分派資產。

results.content_en:
如何解讀續保保單清單及提示電郵
1. 續保保單清單每月發出,電郵題目為“GIEB Renewal 1st Reminder & Expired Policy List"
發出日期:每月第二個工作天
(A)表:列出本月內將要到期並已發出續保通知書的保單
(B)表:列出上月份和本月份已到期並已發出續保通知書的保單
例子:如電郵發出日期為5/5/2014,(A)表將會列出由5/5/2014至31/5/2014 到期的保單,而(B)表將會列出由1/4/2014 至 4/5/2014
已到期的保單(請注意:保單清單只包括以支票付款的一般保險的產品)
1
附有(*)的保單號碼將會於到期月最後一個工作天自動續保,惟有關保單以支票繳付保費,故此,提示電郵提醒您與客人聯絡,以
跟進支票付款事宜。
請注意:本續保保單清單只包括以支票付款的一般保險的產品

成功遞交後,客戶會於約三個工作天收到確認短訊通知
電匯及本地電滙繳付保費通知書
中文 | English
表格已成功遞交,並將交予繳費處作進一步處理。相關之客戶亦會收到SMS短訊作確認。
如在此表格上有任何未完成或需要跟進的地方,繳費處職員會聯絡閣下作出跟進。
電匯處理時間為收到匯款及所需文件之日期:截止時間為週一至週五下午2:00香港時間+七個工作天。

短訊內容
中文版
保誠:本公司已收悉經閣下授權的理財顧問就保單000012 **** 78[保單號碼] 提交電匯或本
地電匯繳付保費通知書,閣下亦已明白及同意pruhk.co/ttpayment所載之事項。電匯繳款申
請正在處理中,正式收據將於核實付款後發出,並可透過myPrudential閱覽。
英文版
Prudential: We have received the Notification for Telegraphic Transfer Payment or
Local Telegraphic Transfer of Policy Premium from your authorized Financial
Consultant for policy 000012 **** 78[Policy No] and confirmed your
understanding and agreement to the items listed under pruhk.co/ttpayment.
Your payment request is being processed. An official receipt will be issued and

results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
Dealing With Clients' Usual Questions
處理客戶常見問題
Question: How long can my Trust last?
問題:我的信託最長可持續多久?
30
交通銀行信託有限公司
BANK OF COMMUNICATIONS TRUSTEE LIMITEDDealing With Clients' Usual Questions
處理客戶常見問題
Answer:
(1) Depends on the choice of the trust governing law
視乎選擇那個司法管轄區成立信託
- Hong Kong 香港:80年
- Cayman Islands 開曼群島:150年
- BVI 英屬處女島:100年
- Jersey 澤西:100年
- US Delaware 美國德拉威州:無年期限制
(2) Trust will end automatically when all the trust funds are
distributed away 當全部資產被派發後,信託會自動取消
31
交通銀行信託有限公司
BANK OF COMMUNICATIONS TRUSTEE LIMITED
